title: All the Best Skims Deals to Shop For Black Friday and Cyber Monday
description: 50 percent off cozy loungewear and intimates? Say less.
excerpt: 50 percent off cozy loungewear and intimates? Say less.
text: James Devaney//Getty ImagesBlack Friday is finally here! If you’re still contemplating what to buy during the massive shopping holiday, that’s only because you haven’t yet heard about the best Black Friday Skims deals. Even skeptics can’t deny that Kim Kardashian’s loungewear and intimates are some of the coziest (and most flattering) styles around, and lucky for us, tons of bestsellers are steeply discounted for the holiday weekend.While there are currently great Black Friday fashion deals on everything from Everlane basics to designer footwear, the Skims deals we’re seeing at retailers like Nordstrom and Saks Fifth Avenue are some of the best we’ve encountered in a while. We found savings of up to 50% on viral favorites like the Everyday Sculpt Bodysuit, Soft Lounge Slip Dress, Fits Everybody Bralette, and more. So, if you’ve been eager to try out the buzzy brand or discover new favorites, now’s the absolute best time to do so without paying full price.Whether you’re looking for a versatile dress that can go from your couch to a chill night out in a flash or simply need a surefire gift for your best friend this season, these Black Friday Skims deals have you covered. Below, shop a selection of the best sale finds before they inevitably sell out. html:
Black Friday is finally here! If you’re still contemplating what to buy during the massive shopping holiday, that’s only because you haven’t yet heard about the best Black Friday Skims deals. Even skeptics can’t deny that Kim Kardashian’s loungewear and intimates are some of the coziest (and most flattering) styles around, and lucky for us, tons of bestsellers are steeply discounted for the holiday weekend.

While there are currently great Black Friday fashion deals on everything from Everlane basics to designer footwear, the Skims deals we’re seeing at retailers like Nordstrom and Saks Fifth Avenue are some of the best we’ve encountered in a while. We found savings of up to 50% on viral favorites like the Everyday Sculpt Bodysuit, Soft Lounge Slip Dress, Fits Everybody Bralette, and more. So, if you’ve been eager to try out the buzzy brand or discover new favorites, now’s the absolute best time to do so without paying full price.

Whether you’re looking for a versatile dress that can go from your couch to a chill night out in a flash or simply need a surefire gift for your best friend this season, these Black Friday Skims deals have you covered. Below, shop a selection of the best sale finds before they inevitably sell out.

Tatjana Freund is Hearst's Fashion & Luxury Commerce Editor, covering beauty, fashion and more across multiple brands. Previously, she worked at ELLE.com and Marie Claire. She's a fan of whiskey neat, podcasts that give her nightmares, and one time Zoë Kravitz laughed at a joke she made.
